achievements: Led Embedded Software development of Battery Management System which monitored the cells within each module.
Automated UI development for alarms & parameters which increased flexibility to play with variables and sped up development.
Architected Cloud and Embedded Software solutions to give vehicle IoT functionality.
Implemented software to control the popup-top, awning, and appliances in the vehicle.
Added features for setting the WiFi and Bluetooth configs in the mobile app.
Created model for converting the raw data from variable resistors (i.e. Water Level Sensors).
Engineered test devices for stages of production to identify faulty parts and log IDs before use which accelerated production.
Installed keystroke hidden kernel driver to grab user password.
Destroyed Raspberry Pi OS with kernel process that eliminated all directories while leveraging the acquired user password.
Injected kernel driver that generated an infinite number of processes to freeze user resources.
Engineered M-203 deploy-able surveillance round prototypes partnered with the Department of Defense.
Implemented digital signal processing for sub-modules such as the PIR Motion Sensor, 320x320 Camera, ADC Microphone, 3-Axis, Accelerometer, and GPS.
Created a Flask Application to process raw data collected from the device into the customer's desired formats.
Developed a website to display the processed data allowing the user to select & export specific recordings.
Managed 30 interns by facilitating tasks for day-to-day operations.
Designed community initiatives and academic programs such as the Academy Bridge Program for Rancho Campana High School.
Organized community involvement in Camarillo City Parades, Park Events, and marketing to local businesses.
Coordinated with local businesses and customers to develop products or provide services that met customer needs.
Built rcmakes.com, an e-commerce website
Developed infrastructure for managing, tracking, and delivering ongoing simultaneous projects on Trello.
Trained ROP course students in developing websites using modern web development tools such as Bootstrap, GitHub.
Collaborated with a team of instructors from other branches in creating a modern software engineering curriculum.
